Topic.Title: As always, no sense of urgency from YHOO management! It seems to always be "strategic...

Message.Msg: newag- sometimes it's very difficult dealing with these people ( you know how it is to deal with people!) anyways-i was at the bank & this asian lady was ahead of me. i heard her ask for $10.00 in american money for japanese money. don't look up the exchange rate because i don't care what it is & i know you like to correct people. just for example- the teller indicated 200 yens for $10 dollars & the asian lady went crazy & stated it was 180 yens yesterday! the teller said FLUCT UATION & tha asian lady stated " f all you other people too!

Topic.Title: Yahoo Can Hit $19 On Strong User Engagement

Message.Msg: No comment about the price, but the strong user engagement comment is meaningless. Yahoo has no shortage of visitors but virtually all are freeloaders. They don't click on the ads; they don't buy anything; they just get counted. Like me. So what? I don't believe that the current management is capable of innovating anything; they can barely run what they have now.

Message.Title: Honeymoons and Hypocrites
Message.Msg: Read and watch the media on Yahoo's CEO hire, and they all fawn over her Google background, technology background, politically correctly comment on how wonderful it is to see a female get this wonderful opportunity. Yet, that honeymoon with Marissa lasted just a few weeks, and the all quietly sneaked out of the media center, and sold Yahoo stock.
